mapper.select: SELECT * FROM (SELECT ROWNUM AS rnum, noticeno, noticetitle, noticedesc, noticeregdate, noticemoddate, noticeviewcount FROM (select * from notice WHERE noticetitle LIKE '%'||#{keywordTitle}||'%' AND noticedesc LIKE '%'||#{keywordDesc}||'%' order by noticeno desc) ORDER BY noticeno asc) WHERE rnum BETWEEN #{sizePerPage}*#{page}-9 and #{sizePerPage}*#{page}
SELECT count(noticeNo) FROM notice WHERE noticetitle LIKE '%'||#{keywordTitle}||'%' AND noticedesc LIKE '%'||#{keywordDesc}||'%'
SELECT count(noticeNo) FROM notice WHERE noticeNo > 0
